name: Channel Access Control
description: Restricts channel posting access to whitelisted users

settings_schema.header: Configure channel access restrictions. Users not in the whitelist will be unable to post in restricted channels.

settings.help_text: When true, the plugin will restrict channel access based on configured rules.
JSON configuration for channel access rules. Format: {"channel_id": ["user_id1", "user_id2"]}. Example: {"channelid123": ["userid1", "userid2"], "channelid456": ["userid3"]}
Message to display when a user is blocked from posting.
settings.default: You do not have permission to post in this channel.

settings.help_text: When true, system administrators can post in any restricted channel.
